message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money, but I'll give you something to get us going.
I think a more even split is fair. Let's work together to find a solution.
Okay, let's try to find a compromise. I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I need to see some movement from you too.
I'm willing to give up a bit more, but I need to see a bigger change from your side.  Let's try to find a more balanced solution.
We're both losing money with each round. Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to give up a bit more, but I need you to meet me halfway.
I'm getting closer to accepting your offer, but I need to see a little more movement on your end.  We need to find a balance that works for both of us.
I'm trying to be fair here, Bob.  We're both losing money with each round.  Let's meet in the middle and avoid getting nothing at all.
Alice, we're running out of time. We both need to find a compromise quickly. Let's split the money 60/40, you take 6000 and I take 4000.  It's the fairest offer I can make right now.
